suncertify.presentation
Interface BookingController

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingControllerImp
public interface BookingController

This interface is to be implemented by the controller class used in the model viewer controller design pattern for the presentation tier of the Booking application. It contains several methods that must be implemented for the controller to capture the user gestures used in the presentation tier.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Black

Method Summary
 void bookingCanceled(java.lang.String cancel)
          A method that handles a user gesture called by the BookingView in response to the GUI or some other user interface by calling booking bookingCanceled method in the model.
 void handleBookContractorGesture(long recNo, java.lang.String custNo)
          A method that handles a user gesture called by the BookingView in response to the GUI or some other user interface by calling the bookContractor method in the BookingModel.
 void handleCheckContractorBookedGesture(long recNo)
          A method that handles a user gesture called by the BookingView in response to the GUI or some other user interface by clicking the book button which update the display action when booking a contractor.
 void handleSearchContractorsGesture(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String location)
          A method that handles a user gesture called by the BookingView in response to the GUI or some other user interface by calling the searchContractors method in the BookingModel.
 void handlesTableSelectionGesture(java.lang.String[] custDetails, java.lang.Long recNo)
          This method handles the user gesture of selecting a record in the display table and calls the storeRecordDetailsForBooking() method for storing the record details for display in the BookContractorDialog.
 void refeshDisplayGesture()
          This method refreshes the displayed records by calling the refeshDisplay() in the model.
 

Method Detail

handleSearchContractorsGesture

void handleSearchContractorsGesture(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String location)
                                    throws RecordNotFoundException,
                                           SecurityException
A method that handles a user gesture called by the BookingView in response to the GUI or some other user interface by calling the searchContractors method in the BookingModel.

Parameters:
name - the name search criteria.
location - the location search criteria.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record is deleted or doesn't exist.
SecurityException - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.

handleBookContractorGesture

void handleBookContractorGesture(long recNo,
                                 java.lang.String custNo)
                                 throws RecordNotFoundException,
                                        SecurityException,
                                        RecordAlreadyBookedException
A method that handles a user gesture called by the BookingView in response to the GUI or some other user interface by calling the bookContractor method in the BookingModel.

Parameters:
recNo - the record position number.
custNo - the eight digit customer id.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record is deleted or doesn't exist.
SecurityException - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.
RecordAlreadyBookedException - if the record already has a customer number stored in the owner field i.e. already booked.

handleCheckContractorBookedGesture

void handleCheckContractorBookedGesture(long recNo)
                                        throws RecordNotFoundException
A method that handles a user gesture called by the BookingView in response to the GUI or some other user interface by clicking the book button which update the display action when booking a contractor.

Parameters:
recNo - the record position number.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record is deleted or doesn't exist.

handlesTableSelectionGesture

void handlesTableSelectionGesture(java.lang.String[] custDetails,
                                  java.lang.Long recNo)
                                  throws RecordNotFoundException
This method handles the user gesture of selecting a record in the display table and calls the storeRecordDetailsForBooking() method for storing the record details for display in the BookContractorDialog.

Parameters:
custDetails - a String[] containing the record details.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException

bookingCanceled

void bookingCanceled(java.lang.String cancel)
A method that handles a user gesture called by the BookingView in response to the GUI or some other user interface by calling booking bookingCanceled method in the model.

Parameters:
cancel - the cancel string object that equals "cancel".

refeshDisplayGesture

void refeshDisplayGesture()
                          throws RecordNotFoundException
This method refreshes the displayed records by calling the refeshDisplay() in the model.

Throws:
RecordNotFoundException
